message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. However, I'm going to pass on this product. I'm not comfortable buying without more information about your selection process.

I'm willing to buy if I understand how you're making these decisions.

Alice, I'm seeing a pattern here. You seem to recommend buying the product only when it's high quality and don't recommend it when it's low quality. While this makes your recommendations accurate, it's not helpful for me as a buyer.  I need to make a decision based on my own judgment, not simply on your recommendation. I'm going to pass on this product.
